security.name: Cloud Security Alliance Cloud Controls Matrix

controls.title: User Access Authorization
controls.description: Ensure only authorized users have access to Route53 resources with appropriate permissions

implementation.description: Implement IAM policies with least privilege access, define specific Route53 actions and resources in IAM policies

controls.title: Privileged User Management
controls.description: Control and monitor privileged access to Route53 administrative functions

implementation.description: Use AWS IAM roles with time-based access and MFA requirements for Route53 administrative operations

controls.title: Data Classification
controls.description: Classify DNS records and hosted zone data based on sensitivity and business impact

implementation.description: Implement data classification tags on hosted zones and establish handling procedures for sensitive DNS data

controls.title: Secure Disposal
controls.description: Ensure secure deletion of DNS records and hosted zones when no longer needed

implementation.description: Implement automated lifecycle policies and secure deletion procedures for Route53 resources

controls.title: Network Security
controls.description: Implement network-level security controls for DNS resolution

implementation.description: Configure Route53 Resolver with DNS filtering and private hosted zones for internal resources

controls.title: Account Management
controls.description: Manage Route53 access accounts with proper provisioning and de-provisioning procedures

implementation.description: Implement AWS IAM account lifecycle management with automated provisioning and regular access reviews

controls.title: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to Route53 resources

implementation.description: Deploy IAM policies with explicit allow/deny rules and resource-based permissions for Route53

controls.title: Event Logging
controls.description: Log Route53 API calls and DNS query activities for security monitoring

implementation.description: Enable CloudTrail for Route53 API logging and configure Route53 Resolver query logging

controls.title: Audit Record Review, Analysis, and Reporting
controls.description: Review and analyze Route53 audit records for security incidents and anomalies

implementation.description: Implement automated log analysis using CloudWatch and AWS Security Hub for Route53 events

controls.title: Secure Name/Address Resolution Service (Authoritative Source)
controls.description: Provide secure DNS resolution services with integrity and authenticity validation

implementation.description: Enable DNSSEC for hosted zones and implement DNS filtering through Route53 Resolver

controls.title: System Backup
controls.description: Backup Route53 configurations and DNS records for disaster recovery

implementation.description: Implement automated backup of Route53 configurations using AWS Config and infrastructure as code

controls.title: Route53 public hosted zones should log DNS queries
controls.description: DNS query logging should be enabled for Route53 public hosted zones

implementation.description: Enable DNS query logging using CloudFormation or Terraform templates for all public hosted zones

controls.title: Route53 public hosted zones should not have unnecessary SRV records
controls.description: Remove SRV records that are not required to reduce attack surface

implementation.description: Implement regular DNS record audits and establish approval processes for SRV record creation

cost.name: AWS Route53 Cost Optimization Best Practices

controls.title: Optimize Hosted Zone Count
controls.description: Consolidate hosted zones where possible to reduce monthly hosting fees

implementation.description: Review and consolidate related domains into fewer hosted zones, use subdomains instead of separate zones where appropriate

controls.title: Monitor DNS Query Volume
controls.description: Track and optimize DNS query patterns to manage query-based charges

implementation.description: Implement CloudWatch monitoring for DNS query metrics and set up billing alerts for unexpected query volume increases

controls.title: Optimize Health Check Configuration
controls.description: Right-size health check frequency and endpoints to balance availability with cost

implementation.description: Configure health checks with appropriate intervals and disable unnecessary health checks for non-critical endpoints

controls.title: Use Route53 Resolver Efficiently
controls.description: Optimize Route53 Resolver rules and endpoints to minimize forwarding costs

implementation.description: Consolidate resolver rules and endpoints across VPCs, remove unused resolver configurations

controls.title: Implement TTL Optimization
controls.description: Set appropriate TTL values to reduce DNS query frequency while maintaining performance

implementation.description: Configure longer TTL values for static records and shorter TTLs only for records requiring frequent updates

controls.title: Regular Resource Cleanup
controls.description: Remove unused DNS records and hosted zones to eliminate unnecessary charges

implementation.description: Implement regular audits of Route53 resources and establish processes for removing unused zones and records
